companyFinancials.definition: Market cap: shares outstanding * price. Revenue: TTM.

marketIndices.source: Yahoo Finance (^GSPC, ^IXIC, SOXX, XLI) + robotics basket
marketIndices.definition: Normalized to 100 at series start. Robotics = weighted basket of NVDA, ISRG, ABB, FANUY, ROK, SYM, PATH, TSLA.

leadingIndicators.source: IFR, WIPO, LinkedIn Workforce Reports, Government programs
leadingIndicators.definition: Composite scores based on publicly available trend data

supplyChain.source: Industry reports, IFR, public supplier data
supplyChain.definition: Lead times and concentration from public supplier filings

livePulse.definition: Robotics equity basket (NVDA, ISRG, ABB, ROK, FANUY, SYM) with last price, % change, and market cap.

liveNews.definition: Latest robotics-related headlines from the public HN index.
